tag_narrative: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
title_narrative: Annual support  to GICHD for advocacy activities and mine action policies
Contributo annuale al GICHD per attività di advocacy e sostegno alle politiche di sminamento umanitario
sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: Annual support to GICHD advocay activities in order to reduce the impact of mines, cluster munitions and other explosive hazards, in close partnership with mine action organisations and other human security actors.The contribution will also support, through GICHD, activities implemented by the Implementation Support Units (ISUs) of the Ottawa Convention , the Oslo Convention, the Geneva Call and the Italian section of the International Campaign to Ban Landmines.

Contributo annuale al GICHD per l’universalizzazione degli strumenti di diritto internazionale in materia di sminamento, nonché per garantire, attraverso il GICHD, supporto alla Implementation Support Unit (ISU) della Convenzione di Ottawa sulle mine anti-persona; alla ISU della Convenzione di Oslo sulle munizioni a grappolo, alla OSC svizzera Geneva Call, per le attività di advocacy verso i gruppi armati non statali, e alle attività di advocacy in ambito nazionale e internazionale della Campagna Italiana contro le Mine, sezione italiana della International Campaign to Ban Landmines – Cluster Munition Coalition (ICBL – CMC).
